articles.author: DANIEL POLITI, PATRICIA LUNA
articles.title: Kissinger's unwavering support for brutal regimes still haunts Latin America - The Associated Press
articles.description: Leftists in Chile were tortured, tossed from helicopters and forced to watch relatives be raped during the military dictatorship of Gen. Augusto Pinochet. In Argentina, many were “disappeared” by members of the brutal military dictatorship that held detainees…
articles.content: SANTIAGO, Chile (AP) In Chile, leftists were tortured, tossed from helicopters and forced to watch relatives be raped. In Argentina, many were disappeared by members of the brutal military dictatorsh… [+9254 chars]

articles.title: 'American icon': Biden pays tribute to Sandra Day O'Connor - POLITICO
articles.description: Biden praised O'Connor's dedication to public service and the “bedrock American principle of an independent judiciary."
articles.content: As a U.S. Senator on the Judiciary Committee, I remember the hope surrounding her historic nomination to the Supreme Court. The Senate voted 99-0 in her favor, proof that our nation can come together… [+2414 chars]
